name: Forgive me (alex_extinction)
description:
"...hell is more than real. And i made every singe thing to end up in here."

Forgive me - is the concept of my future survival horror game with crafting, combat, exploring and its own world with unique characters and monsters. 

This game supports two game modes:
In story mode you have to uncover the secrets of the strange flat (10-15 min long).
In survival mode you have to survive until 6AM, fighting for your life (~20 min long).

KEY BINDINGS:
WASD - Movement
E - interact
F - Flashlight
TAB - Open/Close inventory
SPACE - Block
LSHIFT - Run
RMB - Aim 
LMB - Fire/Attack
1,2 - Swap weapons (if second slot active)

Game powered on UE5 with Lumen lightning system. Expect nice visuals, but greater system requirements. You can try to adjust settings in game menu.

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS:
Graphics card with at least 2GB VRAM (better to have 2GB+)
2GB+ of free disk space
4GB+ of RAM

I am a single developer, and only began my jorney in game development. This is my first project. You can support me by writing a comment or follow me on social media. If you consider a  donation, i will be the happiest developer on the planet :)
